title: Update regarding Quantum Compute
story_body:
Quantum Compute (QNTM) reported the following updates:

At 08:00 EST, the company announced the appointment of Emily Chen as Director of Marketing, effective immediately. Ms. Chen will be responsible for leading the company's global marketing efforts.

In a separate release, Quantum Compute announced that it has partnered with the non-profit organization, STEM for All, to support educational initiatives in underserved communities. The partnership aims to promote diversity and inclusion in the field of quantum computing.

Additionally, the company released its 2022 Sustainability Report, which highlights its environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance. The report notes that Quantum Compute has reduced its carbon footprint by 12% year-over-year and has implemented a diversity and inclusion program to promote equal opportunities in the workplace.

These updates were disclosed in accordance with regulatory requirements and are available on the company's website. Quantum Compute is scheduled to report its quarterly earnings on May 15, 2023, at 16:00 EST.
